message: Overall it is a nice pair of shoe at a reasonable price. The sole makes walking quite comfortable. A little rigid on the side, but probably will wear off once break in. Shoe laces are a little too long though.
liked the price.liked the way they fit and liked the style,did not like the color it it was navy but it is so close to being black.real dark blue.

Nothing positive to say, ive ordered many brand shoes online such as Nike, Puma, Fila etc... I never was disappointed till now on quality and size of a shoe. As usual before ordering i look up the brands official size chart (toe to heel measurement) oh boy not only they do not know their own sizes but they surely don't know how to measure ! ordered a 11.5 or 45 euro size which translated according to their chart to my toe-to-heel i received an 11.5 or 45 but measured up it sized equal to a 13 or 47 euro size according most other brands... Also there is zero comfort or quality in this shoe, there is no padding on the sides and bottom, the inner sole is just flat and thin, painfully to walk with even if its the proper size. the shoes feel cheap.

Después de ponerle como 2 plantillas me quedo para la próxima compraré 1 talla menos. Y digo la próxima por qué a parte de lo grande son perfectos los zapatos caen con todo!! Muy cómodos y al año recién empezó a salir el color.
Me gusto la calidad fue justo lo que deseaba lo uso a diario
Nice fit… dress up or dress down.

Los zapatos son un poco grandes para la talla US que normalmente uso, pedí en talla US 8.5 y me quedan algo grandes debería haber pedido unos US 7.5 que estarían perfectos para mi. Algo que no me gusta es que los zapatos están hechos en China, desconozco si la marca TH tiene sus fábricas allá o si estos zapatos no son originales y son una réplica.
Very comfortable. But layer seems to be needed inside

I can't emphasize enough that the shoe itself is great. It looks fantastic, feels nice, and I get compliments. However, the soles are crazily smooth! Even while driving my car my foot has slipped off the gas pedal. Walking on smooth surfaces feels weird because there's no grip and my back foot sometimes slides a little as I push off my foot. Great shoe, would be a 5/5 if not for the slipping

Muy bonitos, tallan bien. La talla es tal cual.
Is stylish, it fitted perfectly but they’re a little bit slippery

Typical low support canvas shoe. A bit more substantial than Converse All Stars and a bit more appropriate for casual dress.  Less hip/classis.  Still, a good fit and a good look. The tread material is hard. It should be durable, but it slips on some laminate floors.  It is good on concrete and carpet.
I've been wearing these shoes daily for a little over a week now. Haven't had any quality issues, they're super lightweight and comfortable!
Very nice purchase

This is a nice low profile shoe. It is a well made, light weight, reasonably comfortable, nice looking shoe. However, it is a little lacking in support.  I use an insole, and it works fine.

They're what you'd want out of a shoe. Very well put together. However the bottom offers almost no grip. On a sidewalk or carpet or something you're fine. However if you're on epoxy or any sort of smooth surface, your feet will kick out behind you has you put pressure to move forward. There is little to no grip on the bottom at all.
Incredible deal. I take an 11. First time with this brand. Fit was perfect. Comfortable and stylish. Highly recommend. Got an amazing deal as well.
Just 1/2 inch larger at least. Other than that great shoes, a lot of style, super comfortable.

Comfortable and stylish shoe. However, not a fan of the material on the bottom of shoes (cork material) as I have had experience with this before and they wear easily and let water into the shoe over time.

Very nice, not really comfortable, you feel all the rocks you step on, but the style of the sneaker are cool. I will recommend only if you use them for styling for a cookout or gathering do not try to run in these or where them to walk for a long time. You will regret it.

Sadly I love these shoes. They are nice, good fit, conformable. The only draw back is that after about 2 weeks the nice blue color started fading naturally without washing. They are new but now just look old and weathered.

I’m a size 13 for almost every brand and when these came in I was excited because they look so nice….but they are almost 3 full inches too large and I’m swimming in them..not accurate sizing at all. Returning these immediately.
I love the style on these shoes, but there is almost no traction; they might need to wear in a bit to get some grip, but be careful in the meantime or you might end up sliding.

They're stylish and reasonably priced, but the fabric lining on the inside of the shoe ripped, along with part of the soul on the side of each shoe. I've only had them since late August. Overall, not very durable. I think they would be okay for semi-casual occasions, but not for everyday wear.

These sneakers are perfect for casual wear.  They are great for running errands, going out for a bite to eat, or you can dress them up for a garden party or down for a ball game.  They are not meant for, or good at working out, playing ball, or any kind of physical activity.  I have used these for going to the amusement park with my children and after a full day of chasing, riding and walking my feet survived, but would have been happier in my Nike runners.  They look great with jeans, khakis, or shorts and with just a little care last two years before cracking and falling apart.  I am using this same review for another pair as they are equal with the exception of color and minor cosmetics.  I have been wearing different iterations of these for going on 4 years and the quality and fit has been consistent.
